last_episode_to_air.name: Kagachi-sama Onagusame Tatematsurimasu: Netorare Mura Inya Hanashi The Animation
last_episode_to_air.overview:
On his 2nd wedding anniversary, Takahiko realized that he no longer felt sexually excited with his beloved wife, Manami.

He realized that this impotence was due to the strange tradition he had witnessed in his hometown, where sex parties took place every night in the dark throughout the summer festival.

At that time, he ran out of his horrified hometown, but now he realized that he could heal himself just by returning to that place ...

name: Kagachi-sama Onagusame Tatematsurimasu: Netorare Mura Inya Hanashi The Animation
